name: Admin Group
description: Users who have privileged rights and who has access to modify the content of the application, adding, deleting users,keynotes, factsheets etc

name: AGM Group
description: This group consists of users who has some specific rights like adding the owners, visitors, supporters for the visits & etc

name: Visit Manager Group
description: This Group consists of users who can manage the entire visits like scheduling, modifying the visits

name: Feedback Manager Group
description: This group consists of users can manage the feedbacks of the single sessions & feedbacks of the entire visit
